scripts.test: pnpm test:unit & pnpm test:todomvc & pnpm test:node-sync
scripts.test:todomvc: PLAYWRIGHT_SUITE=todomvc DEV_SERVER_PORT=$(find-free-port) DEV_SERVER_COMMAND='PORT=$DEV_SERVER_PORT pnpm --filter livestore-example-src-todomvc dev' playwright test src/tests/playwright/todomvc.play.ts
scripts.test:unit: PLAYWRIGHT_SUITE=unit DEV_SERVER_PORT=$(find-free-port) DEV_SERVER_COMMAND='pnpm vite dev' playwright test src/tests/playwright/unit-tests.play.ts
